scripts.proto:generate: mkdir -p proto/pb && npx protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ts=$(which protoc-gen-ts) --ts_out=proto/pb --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:proto/pb -I proto proto/*.proto
scripts.proto:watch: nodemon --watch proto --ext proto --exec npm run proto:generate

//: To add new proto files, place them in the proto/ directory and run 'npm run proto:generate' to generate the corresponding JavaScript and TypeScript files.
